text: Breil/Brigels (, ) is a municipality of the district Surselva of the canton of Graub√ºnden in Switzerland. On 1 January 2018 the former municipalities of Andiast and Waltensburg/Vuorz merged into the municipality of Breil/Brigels. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website * Category:Municipalities in Surselva
